strategy: Perform targeted feature engineering by creating interaction terms between numerical variables (e.g., 'total_area' × 'number_of_rooms') and derive polynomial features up to degree 2 for key predictors. Additionally, encode categorical variables using target encoding with smoothing (e.g., LambdaLoss) to preserve group-level information. Apply robust scaling to stabilize variance and use a simple Random Forest model with permutation-based feature importance to guide further refinement.
